Class CaesarCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • week1.CaesarCipher

  • public class CaesarCipher
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of Caesar Cipher.
    Version:
    2015-11-18
    Author:
    Pawel Daniluk

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CaesarCipher() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String input, int key)
      Method encrypts input with Caesar Cipher
      java.lang.String encryptTwoKeys(java.lang.String input, int key1, int key2)
      Parameter key1 is used to encrypt every other character with the Caesar Cipher algorithm, starting with the first character, and key2 is used to encrypt every other character, starting with the second character.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        public java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String input,
                                int key)
        Method encrypts input with Caesar Cipher
        Parameters:
        input - String to be encrypted
        key - key to be used in cipher
        Returns:
        ciphered input string

      • encryptTwoKeys

        public java.lang.String encryptTwoKeys(java.lang.String input,
                                       int key1,
                                       int key2)
        Parameter key1 is used to encrypt every other character with the Caesar Cipher algorithm, starting with the first character, and key2 is used to encrypt every other character, starting with the second character.
        Parameters:
        input - input to be encrypted
        key1 - key to encrypt every other char in input (starting from 0)
        key2 - key to encrypt every other char in input (starting from 1)
        Returns:
        string encrypted with two keys
